configuration.appLauncher.showEnableShel: Show a prompt when shell integration is disabled.
configuration.appLauncher.showShellInteg: Show a warning when shell integration is not supported by the active terminal.
configuration.appLauncher.terminalAppUrl: Where to open app URLs when clicked in the Terminal.
Prompt to choose where to open app URLs when clicked.
Open app URLs in the Viewer.
Open app URLs in the default browser.
